name: Homepage - Header - All the menu links on the "Information" tab

testSteps.description: Homepage - Header - All the menu links on the "Information" tab #1: {menuLinks=news feeds, category=daily}

children.description: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
Open page:
When I click on the {news feeds} in the Information tab
Click info menu links: news feeds
Then the {news feeds} page should open correctly
Should see page: news feeds

userStory.narrative:
In order to assure that the basic functionality of disasterassistance.gov is working
As a tester
I want to run the daily regressions at least twice a day
